topic.title: Replacing the Journal Disk in a Ceph OSD Node

abstract.shortdesc: Maintenance steps for replacing the journal disk in a Ceph OSD node.

section.p: supports a Ceph environment with the following OSD node configurations:

ul.li: OSD nodes with no journal disk
OSD nodes with a dedicated journal disk
OSD nodes with a shared journal disk (partition)

section.p: For the first scenario where the journal information is stored on a partition on the OSD data disk, the steps to replace the data disk should be followed. For more information, see .
